title: Genesis Global Trading to Shutter Crypto Spot Trading Desk
description: Genesis Global Trading will halt its crypto OTC desk later this month.

title: Coinbase raises bond buyback limit to $180M amid a surge in investor interest
description:
Coinbase increased its bond buyback limit to $180 million and extended its deadline to Sept. 18, according to a Sept. 5 statement. Coinbase extended its deadline due to unexpectedly high interest in its buyback program. The exchange initially proposed repurchasing its 3.625% senior notes, maturing in 2031, at $675 per $1,000 principal amount of tendered […]

The post Coinbase raises bond buyback limit to $180M amid a surge in investor interest appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: VC Rug? Nima Capital Dumps $3M SYN From Cross-Chain Bridge Synapse
description: Nima Capital accused of a 'rug pull' by selling $3.1M of SYN tokens ahead of time, causing a 22% drop in value.

title: South Korean bank develops crypto custody together with BitGo
description: The South Korean bank KEB Hana Bank closed a new partnership with the cryptocurrency company BitGo to develop crypto custody. The partnership between the two companies will aim to develop a cryptocurrency custody business in South Korea. KEB Hana Bank…

title: Bitrock: an EVM-compatible, high throughput sidechain
description: This article explores Bitrock,  a layer-2 sidechain compatible with Ethereum that uses a proof-of-authority (PoA) consensus mechanism
